pages.text: $(item)Coal Coke$() is the result of carbonizing $(item)Coal Blocks$() in a $(thing)Refractory Burn$().$(p)$(info) $(item)Coal Coke$() is more efficient than $(item)Charcoal$() or $(item)Coal$().$(p)$(info) $(item)Coal Coke Blocks$() have increased efficiency when used in a $(item)Bloomery$() or $(item)Wither Forge$().
